radioGroup.essential:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the 'Essential' feedback type radio button
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Right Pane → How Important radio group
**When Users See This**: When providing feedback on a student's solution, choosing the importance level
**Technical Context**: Interpolates with `i.value` which is 'essential'; must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "Essential"
radioGroup.essentialTooltipTitle:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the tooltip explaining the 'Essential' feedback type
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Right Pane → How Important radio group (tooltip for 'Essential')
**When Users See This**: When hovering over the info icon next to the 'Essential' radio button
**Technical Context**: Interpolates with `i.value` which is 'essential'; must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "If you mark this as Essential"
radioGroup.essentialTooltipBody:
**Functional Purpose**: Body text for the tooltip explaining the 'Essential' feedback type
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Right Pane → How Important radio group (tooltip for 'Essential')
**When Users See This**: When hovering over the info icon next to the 'Essential' radio button
**Technical Context**: Interpolates with `i.value` which is 'essential'; must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "Student is prompted heavily to action this before proceeding. Essential enhancement."

**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Right Pane → How Important radio group

**Functional Purpose**: Body text for the tooltip explaining the 'Recommended' feedback type
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Representation → Right Pane → How Important radio group (tooltip for 'Recommended')
**When Users See This**: When hovering over the info icon next to the 'Recommended' radio button
**Technical Context**: Interpolates with `i.value` which is 'actionable'; must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "Student is prompted to action this before proceeding, but not considered essential. High-value enhancement."
